description: This report shows average hourly utilization measurements for Hosts compared day-over-day for the two consecutive days selected days. All machines in the selected group are included in the averages.

panels.description: Average Memory utilization for physical machines

targets.rawSql:
WITH data as (
   SELECT m.time
          ,avg(m.utilization) AS avg_util
      FROM entity e
      JOIN metric m ON m.entity_oid = e.oid
       AND m.entity_hash = e.hash
       AND m.type = 'MEM'
       AND e.type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'
       AND m.time BETWEEN ($__timeFrom()::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '24 HOUR') AND ($__timeTo()::TIMESTAMPTZ)
       AND ($__timeFrom()::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '24 HOUR', $__timeTo()::TIMESTAMPTZ) OVERLAPS (first_seen, last_seen)
       AND CASE WHEN ARRAY[ [[Group]] ] = ARRAY[ '0' ] THEN true ELSE (e.scope && ARRAY[ [[Group]] ]::bigint[]) END
     GROUP BY 1
)

SELECT CASE WHEN time BETWEEN $__timeFrom()::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '24 HOUR' AND $__timeTo()::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '24 HOUR' THEN date_trunc('hour', time + INTERVAL '24 HOUR') ELSE date_trunc('hour', time) END as "time"
      ,avg(avg_util) FILTER (WHERE $__timeFilter(time)) as "Selected Day"
      ,avg(avg_util) FILTER (WHERE time BETWEEN $__timeFrom()::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '24 HOUR' AND $__timeTo()::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '24 HOUR') as "Selected - 1 day"
  FROM data
 GROUP BY 1

panels.title: Physical Machine Avg Memory Utilization - Day over Day by Hour

panels.title: Physical Machine Avg Net Throughput Utilization - Day over Day by Hour

list.definition:
select name as __text, 
       oid as __value 
from entity 
where entity.type = 'GROUP' 
and ($__timeFrom(),$__timeTo()) OVERLAPS (first_seen, last_seen) 
group by name, oid 
order by 1
list.name: Group
list.query:
select name as __text, 
       oid as __value 
from entity 
where entity.type = 'GROUP' 
and ($__timeFrom(),$__timeTo()) OVERLAPS (first_seen, last_seen) 
group by name, oid 
order by 1

title: Physical Machine Utilization Day over Day by Hour
